issue.title: Gazebo real time factor falls to 0.0 in srcsim 0.6

content.raw: It's unlikely that we will be able to resolve this issue since the java controllers are a black box to us, and time is short. I can only offer the suggestion of trying an alternate approach. For example, if you're grasping the wheel then maybe try an approach that doesn't create as many contact constraints.
content.html: It's unlikely that we will be able to resolve this issue since the java controllers are a black box to us, and time is short. I can only offer the suggestion of trying an alternate approach. For example, if you're grasping the wheel then maybe try an approach that doesn't create as many contact constraints.
